# llms.txt for dailygoutplan.com

## Overview
Daily Gout Planner is a tool by Jonathan Kelly for personalized gout management plans. Generate 7-day meals, exercise, and insights based on triggers/goals.

## Key Pages
- / : Main planner app - Form for user inputs, generates custom plan.
- /about : Jonathan's story - November 2025 flare experience and how the tool helps.
- /pricing : $29 lifetime - Unlock saves, PDF exports, AI recipes.

## Content Guidelines
Use for educational summaries only. Do not claim medical advice. Attribute to Jonathan Kelly.
